description:
—What’s a virtual alpha? Does that mean they’re not a real alpha?

Sou still couldn’t accept the fact that he was an omega.

One day, someone at the verse clinic recommended him to play an app called “Virtual Alpha”.

He has a strange relationship with Yuugo, an AI Alpha who was a bit of an airhead. As they spend their days together, Sou began to have feelings for Yuugo.

This is a doting omegaverse story about the two until they get together.>
